description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 2.0 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Light Commercial HVAC that are effective as of January 1, 2011. A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=lchvac.pr_crit_lchvac

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Light Commercial HVAC
